name: Pamoira
description:
Move with arrows or z,q,s,d
Target with the mouse
Heal sharks with left click
Attack ennemies with right click
Survive !

Sharks taunt ennemies and give you extra points so keep them alive as much as possible !
You've few HP but you can recover them with time.

Music from YipYep
https://freesound.org/people/YipYep/

Have fun, have highscores !!
